message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.LG

The paper discusses the development of a cognitive assessment tool that uses multimodal and multisensory input to assist doctors and therapists in assessing dementia. This falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as it involves the interaction between humans and technology. The use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) is also mentioned in the paper as a means of analyzing the data collected by the tool. Natural language processing (cs.CL) is another potential sub-category as the tool involves the use of speech recognition. Cybernetics (cs.CY) is also a possibility as the tool involves the integration of multiple sensory inputs. Finally, machine learning (cs.LG) is another potential sub-category as the paper discusses the use of machine learning algorithms to analyze the data collected by the tool.
